{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = TL-WR802N-01.jpg |image1_size = 150px |caption = 300Mbps Wireless N Nano Router |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = http://www.tp-link.com.cn/product_324.html?v=spe |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = TP-LINK_TL-WR802N_v1.0 |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = TP-LINK |model = TL-WR802N |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = v1.0 |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = N300 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = travel router,access point,repeater,bridge |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = TE7WR802N |icid = 8853A-WR802N |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA9533;QCA9533-AL3A; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = MIPS 24Kc |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 650 |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Winbond;W25Q32BVSIG; |flash1size = 4 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 32 |ram1chip = ESMT;M13S2561616A-5T; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 08:57:00 |oui = 08:57:00
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = <!-- Expansion Interface types, Leave blank for none -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = 0.55 |pwr_conn = USB Female Micro-B |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = <!-- flags, Leave blank for none --> |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = bgn
|defaulip = 192.168.1.253 |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = TP-LINK_XXXXXX |defaultssid_regex = ^TP-LINK_[A-F0-9]{6}$ |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |is_manuf = Yes |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 04/14/2015 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B00TQEX8BO |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== The default SSID for the device is '''TP-LINK_XXXXXX''' where '''XXXXXX''' is the last three octets of the wireless interface MAC (upper case letters). This device is also sold as the FAST FW301RM and the Mercury MW301RM.
===Specifications=== *[http://blog.ich8.com/post/4837 On '''ich8''' blogs] (images) • [http://blog.ich8.com/post/4850 Firmware/ART/Uboot] :"2050500387" and "1404" is silkscreened on the board. :*SoC: [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9533 (QCA9531 rev 1) :*Flash: ''Winbond'' W25Q32 (4MB), RAM: 32MB (DDR1) :*Clocks: CPU: 550MHz, DDR: 400MHz, AHB: 200MHz, ::SPI: 20MHz, Ref: 25MHz *[https://www.ifixit.com/Teardown/TP-Link+TL-WR802N+N300+Nano+Router+Teardown/96230 Teardown on '''iFixit'''] :"2050500485" and "1603" is silkscreened on the board. :*CPU: [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9533-AL3A (@560MHz) :*Flash: ''Winbond'' W25Q32FVSIG (4MB) :*RAM: ''Zentel'' A3S56D40GTP-50L (32MB)
==Links of Interest== *[https://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/tp-link/tl-wr802n ''TP-LINK TL-WR802N'' on '''OpenWrt''' wiki]
==Pictures== <center>'''Retail Images''' <gallery> File:TL-WR802N-01.jpg| File:TL-WR802N-02.jpg| File:TL-WR802N-03.jpg| </gallery></center>[[Has images::retail| ]][[Has images::external| ]]
==See also== *[[TP-LINK TL-WR802N v1.0]] • FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/TE7WR802N TE7WR802N] (04/14/2015) *[[TP-LINK TL-WR802N v2.x]] • FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/TE7WR802NV2 TE7WR802NV2] (01/27/2016) *[[TP-LINK TL-WR802N v4.x]] • FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/TE7WR802NV4 TE7WR802NV4] (05/17/2017) :"2050500885" and "1652" is silkscreened on the board. :*CPU: [[MediaTek]] MT7628N (@575MHz) 2T2R WiSoC
[[Category:English Documentation]]
